name: An Autumn With You
description:
made for GBJam8

Your family has just moved to a remote location out in the country. Help them settle in and explore the wilderness around your Nana's house!

Disclaimer:
Game was pretty much rushed to the Deadline. This game page will be filled with more information in the following days.

Controls:
[C] - A button / Interact
[Return] - Start Button
[Select] (on title screen) - Load Game
